fields.name: CgName
fields.description: Panorama Collector Group to join - (Once configured we can not edit the value)

fields.name: ConfigString
fields.description: Base64 encoded string representing Panorama parameters to be used by Firewall to connect to Panorama. This string is generated via azure plugin in Panorama

fields.name: HostName
fields.description: Resource name(may be unique) for PN admin

fields.name: PanoramaServer
fields.description: Primary Panorama Server IP address value in dotted format for IPv4

fields.name: PanoramaServer2
fields.description: Secondary Panorama Server IP address value in dotted format for IPv4

fields.name: TplName
fields.description: Panorama Template Stack to join - (Once configured we can not edit the value)

fields.name: VMAuthKey
fields.description: VM auth key for panorama connectivity
